lines.text: DUMMY
a = 2d array of characters with size 100 by 100
create integers n , m , up = 50 , left = 50 , down = 0 , right = 0
lines.code: int n , m , up = 50 , left = 50 , down = 0 , right = 0 ;

lines.text: read n and m
for i = 1 to n inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = 1 to m inclusive read a [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= m ; j ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] [ j ] ;

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to n inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = 1 to m inclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= m ; j ++ )

lines.text: if a [ i ] [ j ] is equal to ' * '
if i is less than up , set up to i
if i is greater than down , set down to i
if j is less than left , set left to j
if j is greater than right , set right to j

DUMMY
for i = up to down inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = up ; i <= down ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = left to right inclusive print a [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = left ; j <= right ; j ++ ) cout << a [ i ] [ j ] ;

lines.text: print new line
